Kind Attention: Chartering Desk
Dear Sir / Ma’am,
Good Day,
Please Propose Suitable Cargo for Voyage for Our Period Tonnage :
MV Happy Hero - Opening at Dammam - 8th September, 2024
ABT 10,090 MTDW TWEEN DECK GENERAL CARGO VESSEL
BUILT APRIL 2002 AT SHIN KURUSHIMA DOCKYARD
PANAMANIAN FLAG - NK CLASS – IMO 9254276
LOA  100.60M / LBP 93.50M / BM 18.80M / DM 13.00M / DRAFT 9.219M
GRT 6,381T / NRT 3,658T
TWO HOLDS (LOWER HOLDS ARE BOX SHAPE)
HOLD CAPACITY GRAIN 13,999.08 M3 / BALE 12,857.98 M3
DECK CRANE 23T X 2
DERRICK 15T X 1
( FIGURES ARE ALL ABOUT WITHOUT GUARANTEE).
MV ASHICO VICTORIA - Opening at Abu Dhabi - 8th September, 2024
PANAMA FLAG, NK CLASS, BLT 2009,
DWT/DWCC 10,071MT/ 9,500MT ON 9.065M,
2H/2H, TWEENDECKER.
GT/NT: 6,732/ 3,259, LOA/BM/DEPTH:103.64/18.80/13.2M 2H/ 2H;
G/B: 13,658.87/12,696.95CBM, HATCH SIZE: NO.1: 21.75X12.6M,
NO 2: 28.10X12.6M MACGREGOR HATCH COVER (SINGLE TYPE PULL).
CRANES 2 X 23MT + DERRICK 1 X 23MT,
( FIGURES ARE ALL ABOUT WITHOUT GUARANTEE).
Pleased to Hear!!
Best Regards,
Ayush Sharma
Chartering, YB Global Shipping LLC-FZ
Mobile/WhatsApp/Skype: +91 9523757703
www.ybglobalshipping.com|  chartering@ybglobalshipping.com
